metadata.title: Software Development | Building digital solutions
metadata.description: Specialized team building high-quality web and mobile applications. From zero to deployment, with solid architecture and clean code.

hero.headline: From MVP to scale: We build digital products that grow with your business
hero.subheadline: We transform your idea into a digital product running in production. Scalable architecture, documented code, and transparent technical decisions from day one.

social.title: Proven experience in real products
social.description: We participated in developing products for Hugo Boss, Calvin Klein, Tommy Hilfiger, Globo, and Carlsberg, processing millions of transactions and serving users worldwide.

list.title: Need a reliable technical team
list.description: Want to start a project but don't have a specialized team

list.title: Don't know how to start technically
list.description: Many questions about architecture, stack and best practices

list.title: Concerned about scalability
list.description: Want a solid foundation that handles future growth

list.title: Looking for quality from the start
list.description: Don't want to deal with rewrites and technical debt later

solution.title: How we can help
solution.description: We develop your application from scratch with code review from the first commit, automated tests, documented technical decisions, and complete CI/CD setup. You follow the entire process and understand every decision.

steps.title: Planning and architecture
steps.description: We define stack, architecture and project structure with clarity

steps.title: Complete development
steps.description: Frontend, backend, APIs and database - complete solution

steps.title: Native apps (when needed)
steps.description: iOS and Android app development with React Native

steps.title: Deploy and infrastructure
steps.description: We setup production environment, CI/CD and monitoring

steps.title: Technical documentation
steps.description: Documented code and guides to facilitate future maintenance

steps.title: Consultancy (optional)
steps.description: Technical guidance for teams with ongoing projects

audience.title: Who it's for (and who it's not for)

isFor.title: Makes sense if:
list: You have a digital product idea
Need a team to start or evolve
Looking for technical partners, not just execution

isNotFor.title: Doesn't make sense if:
list: Don't accept involvement in technical decisions

about.title: Who we are
about.description: We're a team of software engineers with experience in real products. We've worked on projects for Hugo Boss, Calvin Klein, Tommy Hilfiger, Globo and Carlsberg. We work collaboratively with clients, developing complete solutions: web applications, native apps and backend.

finalCta.title: Let's talk about your case
finalCta.description: If you want to understand if we can help with your project, just fill out the form below. No pressure.

email.label: Email
email.error: Please enter a valid email address

company.label: Company/Project
company.error: Please provide the company or project name

message.label: Tell us about your project
message.placeholder: Briefly describe what you need, challenges you're facing, or how we can help...
message.error: Please provide more details about your project (minimum 10 characters)

contactForm.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
contactForm.error: Error sending message. Please try again.
